title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker command.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python/JS framework ships an Ollama integration for building RAG, agents and chatbots that call local models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library published on PyPI; chat, generate, embed, pull and list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package ollama provides chat & generate calls.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to any local Ollama instance; supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that adds REPL history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates to the ollama command.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline autocomplete.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; shows how to chat with PDFs locally.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model preload.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with one-line run commands and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with extra endpoints for batch generation, auth and usage metrics.

title: ollama-crewai
summary: CrewAI tool that lets autonomous agents spawn and query local Ollama models for reasoning tasks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate on crates.io providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with notes” pane powered by any local Ollama model and vector search.
